## DialogReturnFormat type

Dialog return format

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type DialogReturnFormat = "string" | "file";
```

## Remarks

- `"string"` - Return an array of file paths chosen by the user

- `"file"` - Return an array of files chosen by the user
